channel.title: story legacy at ramiro.me
channel.description:
a show for people who want to tell their story,
make an impact and leave a legacy.

learn how to tell stories that matter.
personal stories from people just like you,
who have gone through
tough shit, and came out with
a story to tell.
channel.author: ramiro.me
channel.itunes:author: ramiro.me
channel.itunes:summary:
a show for people who want to tell their story,
make an impact and leave a legacy.

learn how to tell stories that matter.
personal stories from people just like you,
who have gone through
tough shit, and came out with
a story to tell.

item.title: [s01e01][guest]flavia.lemos.no.mud.no.lotus
item.itunes:author: ramiro.me
item.itunes:summary:
story.legacy

here at ramiro.me

a show for people who want to tell their story, make an impact and leave a legacy.



learn how to tell stories that matter.
personal stories from people just like you,
who have gone through
tough shit, and came out with
a story to tell.



i am ramiro, creator of story.legacy,
your story guide and on this show, i show how to
tell better stories.
stories that matter.



guests come to share their story and we dive into the life lessons learned from those personal experiences.
i share my personal stories, the challenges and growth that came with it.



for more content and training on personal story go to ramiro.me/show
